title: Newsletter Builder with MJML Components and GrapesJS
author: artf
content:
readme.md grapesjs mjml plugin enables usage mjml components inside grapesjs environment. mjml components are rendered real- using official compiler, therefore result is, almost, same using mjml live editor.demosupported components:mj-containermj-sectionmj-columnmj-textmj-imagemj-buttonmj-socialmj-divideroptionsimportplaceholder import placeholder mjml, default: '',modaltitleimport title the import modal, default: 'import mjml',modalbtnimport test the import button, default: 'import',modallabelimport description the import modal, default: '',modaltitleexport title the export modal, default: 'export mjml',modallabelexport description the export modal, default: '',overwriteexport overwrite default export command, default: 'true',premjml string before mjml export code, default: '',postmjml string the mjml export code, default: '',resetblocks clean previous blocks true, default: 'true',resetblocks clean previous devices set new for mobile, default: 'true',resetstylemanager reset style manager add properties mjml, default: 'true',downloadnpm grapesjs-mjml yarn add grapesjs-mjmlusage
